info.name: Fix for MS Edge with Dark Windows Visual Style
info.description: Microsoft Edge uses Windows theme colors for its default CSS. If a user installs a custom visual style for Windows, then Edge may use incorrect colors for certain default CSS elements. For example, white elements may appear as dark gray when using a dark Windows theme. This fix resets the background and text color of affected elements back to black on white. Use the Tampermonkey Edge extension from the Windows Store to apply.
